alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 1:48PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Lewis County through 215 PM EDT... At 148 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Redfield to 8 miles north of Camden. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Whetstone Gulf State Park, Highmarket, Watson, Martinsburg, Lyonsdale, Greig, Port Leyden, Lyons Falls, Constableville, Turin, Osceola, West Leyden, Rector, Mohawk Hill, North Osceola, Swancott Mill, Talcottville, Brantingham and Sperryville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
